rules.description: Detects use of insecure random number generators for security-sensitive operations
rules.recommendation: Use secrets module in Python (secrets.token_bytes(), secrets.token_hex()) or crypto.getRandomValues() in JavaScript for security-sensitive operations
rules.message: The random module/Math.random() is not cryptographically secure and should not be used for security purposes

rules.description: Detects potential path traversal vulnerabilities when constructing file paths with user input
rules.recommendation: Validate and sanitize user input, use os.path.abspath() and check if result is within allowed directory, or use a whitelist approach
rules.message: Constructing file paths with user input can lead to path traversal attacks
